arts.ttl: Arsenal XI vs Athletic Club – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Arsenal travel to the Basque country for their Champions League opener on Tuesday, with Mikel Arteta’s side looking to begin their continental campaign in positive fashion despite injury concerns. arts.ttl: Athletic Club vs Arsenal – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Arsenal begin their quest for European glory on Tuesday with a trip to San Mamés to face Athletic Club. The Gunners are chasing a piece of history in their Champions League opener. A victory would make them the first team ever to win six consecutive matches against Spanish opposition in the competition. arts.ttl: Arsenal may axe three players to face Athletic Club as starting XI predicted
arts.sum: Arsenal are set to face Athletic Club in the Champions League on Tuesday evening, and Mikel Arteta will have to tweak his starting XI with at least one enforced change

arts.ttl: Athletic Club vs Arsenal Champions League suspensions as star banned and red card expires
arts.sum: Athletic Club will be without Yeray Alvarez for their Champions League opener against Arsenal, with the defender serving a 10-month ban after failing a drugs test

arts.ttl: “They are one of the favourites” Athletic Club manager puts Arsenal under pressure
arts.sum: Athletic Club manager Ernesto Valverde has added to the pressure on Arsenal ahead of their opening Champions League fixture by suggesting that the Gunners are among the leading contenders to win the competition this season. Arsenal will travel to Spain this week to face Athletic in what promises to be an intriguing opening encounter. arts.ttl: Mikel Arteta dealt huge Champions League blow as Arsenal stars are ruled out of Athletic Bilbao clash
arts.sum: Arsenal will be without captain Martin Odegaard, Bukayo Saka, Ben White, Kai Havertz and Gabriel Jesus for Tuesday's opening Champions League match against Athletic Bilbao.

arts.ttl: Athletic Club vs Arsenal preview: 'PSG loss last season painful' - Arteta
arts.sum: Arsenal begin their bid to win the Champions League for the first time in their history on Tuesday. “It shows how difficult it is because we haven’t won it (the Champions League) yet.
